attributes.additional_details: Parliament needs to discuss this conduct as a matter of urgency, agree the appropriate course action and how to restore standards in public life
attributes.background: Boris Johnson is the first prime minister to hold the post to be found to have broken the law. He broke laws that were brought in by his government to safeguard the public in a global pandemic, when treatment options were limited and there was no vaccination programme.

rejection.details: The House of Commons will meet at 2.30pm today.
